revised_title: Effects of Heat on Chloride, Bromide, and Iodide of Silver and Chlorobromiodides of Silver
tldr: The author investigates the effects of heat on the chloride, bromide, and iodide of silver, as well as some chlorobromiodides of silver. They find that the melting points and physical properties of these compounds are significantly affected by their composition and temperature, leading to various changes in their structure and behavior.
